p.span: Visit Hoboken Public School District's Early Childhood Department for registration and contact information, program news, parent workshops, and Tools of the Mind Curriculum updates. Meet Hoboken's Early Childhood Advisory Council members and learn more about the work they do and their mission

br.span: Visit our Special Education Department for a description of Hoboken Public School District's continuum of services and programs, resources, parental rights and general procedures, and a directory of Special Education staff members. Learn more about Hoboken's Special Education Parent Advisory Council and meeting dates and topics

span.br: Learn about Hoboken Public School District's Specialized Programs including Gifted and Talented, and Project Lead The Way. Get to know our student identification processes, program descriptions, learning goals, extended learning opportunities, resources, workshops, and contact information.

div.p:
Passport to Learning &
Summer ProgramsVisit the Passport to Learning After School Program page to learn more about our unique after-school enrichment programming.
Our new summer enrichment program lineup includes the LEAP...into Summer Learning Program and the Hoboken Redwings Summer Sports Clinic Series.
